title: Luxe BJ Water, NOBODY LIKES HIM!!! 1.22.20
itunes:title: Luxe BJ Water, NOBODY LIKES HIM!!! 1.22.20
description:
In episode 553, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and co-host of Mega The Podcast Greg Hess to discuss Space Force, Mitch McConnell being shady as usual, Trump lawyers trying to stop John Bolton from testifying, Hillary Clinton's new documentary, Coronavirus, The Matrix 4, updates on Megxit, Watchmen not being renewed, Andy King teaming up with Evian Water, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. US Space Force mocked for unveiling camouflage uniforms
  2. Washington National Cathedral dedicates Bible for newly formed U.S. Space Force
  3. McConnell Doing To Impeachment What He Did To Garland
  4. McConnell drops two-day limit on opening arguments
  5. Trump’s lawyers, Senate GOP allies work privately to ensure Bolton does not testify publicly
  6. Hillary Clinton in Full: A Fiery New Documentary, Trump Regrets and Harsh Words for Bernie: "Nobody Likes Him"
  7. First U.S. Case of Deadly Wuhan Coronavirus Reported in Washington State, CDC Says
  8. National Outbreak Reporting System (NORS)
  9. First Patient With Wuhan Coronavirus Is Identified in the U.S.
  10. ‘The Matrix 4’ Won’t Bring Back Hugo Weaving as Agent Smith, But It Sounds Like That Was the Original Plan
  11. Let’s Break Down Why Prince Harry And Meghan Markle Are In Canada
  12. Welcome to Canada, Dude!
  13. Watchmen Is Getting the F*ck Up Off the Pool and Will Not Return for a Second Season 
  14. 'So Good You'd Do Anything For It': Fyre Festival's Andy King Teams Up with Evian for New Campaign
  15. WATCH: Khruangbin & Leon Bridges ‘C-Side’ (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
